title: Unable to transfer to Oceania Server
body: I was trying to transfer my account(NA) to Oceania Server(OC1), and I'm pretty sure I've followed the correct directions. After I clicked "CONTINUE", however, it forever shows "AN ERROR HAS OCCURRED".  I've made sure to update patches and have enough RP. Is this a bug? Can anyone here help me on this problem?

replies.body:
Are you transferring using the *Legacy Client?* If not, you'll want to switch to the Legacy Client from the login screen before attempting the transfer.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked.
